mapper.select:
SELECT gt.name AS column2, gs.minsecurity, sd.count AS column1, gs.id ,gv.id AS gvid, gs.name AS gname, gv.`name` AS gvname, gs.price,gs.img,gv.`column1` AS gvcol FROM `goods` AS gs
INNER JOIN `goodsvalue` gv ON gs.id = gv.`gid`
LEFT JOIN `stockdetails` AS sd ON gv.id = sd.gvid
LEFT JOIN `goodstype` AS gt ON gt.id = gs.tid
CONCAT(gs.name,gv.`name`) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{liketext},'%')
AND gt.pid = #{pid}
AND gt.id = #{tid}
AND gv.`id` IN ( SELECT gdsv.vid FROM `goodsstandardvalue` AS gdsv WHERE gdsv.svid = #{svid} )
mapper.sql: id, name, tid, code, prevbit, sufbit, bitval, price, jprice, remark, uid, minsecurity, maxsecurity, historygid, time, updatetime, detail, state, enname, column1, column2, column3, column4, column5
mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from goods
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from goods
order by ${orderByClause}
